dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 231 IH: Terminate TikTok on Campus Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Babin (for himself, Ms. Tenney, Mr. Sessions, Mr. Waltz, Mr. Jackson of Texas, and Mr. Santos) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To prohibit Federal funds from being provided to an institution of higher education unless the institution has banned use of TikTok on electronic devices, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Terminate TikTok on Campus Act of 2023.

section.header: Prohibition on Federal funds for any institution of higher education not banning use of TikTok on electronic devices

subsection.text: Following the 90-day period beginning on the date of enactment of this Act, no Federal funds may be provided to an institution of higher education unless the institution of higher education has developed and implemented standards and guidelines—

paragraph.text: prohibiting the use of TikTok on electronic devices owned or issued by the institution; and
requiring the removal of TikTok from electronic devices owned or issued by the institution.

subsection.text: The requirements in subsection (a) shall not apply with respect to research that—

paragraph.text: is conducted by, supervised by, or authorized by faculty of an institution of higher education; and
pertains to national security, law enforcement, telecommunications, or cybersecurity.
The term institution of higher education has the meaning given that term in section 102 of the Higher Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 1002).

subparagraph.text: means a device capable of accessing the internet (either directly or by connecting to another device or system); and
includes a computer, a tablet, a streaming device, a smartphone, a smartwatch, and any other smart device.
means the social networking service TikTok; and
includes any successor application or service developed or provided by ByteDance Limited or an entity owned by ByteDance Limited.
